name: Upward Impulse
description:
Controls

  • A - Move Left
  • D - Move Right
  • Space - Short Hop
  • Enter - Restart
  • Left Click - Hold to prime grenade, release to shoot grenade
  • Right Click - Drop grenade with short fuse at feet

Goal

Break as many targets as early as possible for the best score. Game ends when all targets are broken or you run out of time. Do not worry about falling off, you can only go up in this game and you cannot die!

Strategy

You can fling grenades with other grenades. You can prime a shot and drop another shot at your feet, jumping off the dropped shot towards your primed shot to effectively double jump. You can shoot as many grenades as you want so if all else fails you can try chaos.
